metadata.titleEn: HiWATER: Dataset of ground truth measurements synchronizing with TerraSAR-X satellite overpassing in the Daman Superstation on June 26, 2012
metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：黑河流域中游大满超级站TerraSAR-X地面同步观测数据集（2012年6月26日）
metadata.description:
On June 26, 2012, the satellite transit ground synchronous observation was carried out in the TerraSAR-X sample near the super station in the dense observation area of Daman. TerraSAR-X satellite carries X-band synthetic aperture radar (SAR). The daily transit image is HH / VV polarized, with a nominal resolution of 3 m, an incidence angle of 22-24 ° and a transit time of 19:03 (Beijing time), which mainly covers the ecological and hydrological experimental area of the middle reaches artificial oasis. The local synchronous data set can provide the basic ground data set for the development and verification of active microwave remote sensing soil moisture retrieval algorithm.            
Quadrat and sampling strategy:            
Six natural blocks are selected in the southeast of the super station, with an area of about 100 m × 100 m. One plot in the northwest corner of the sample plot is watermelon field, others are corn. The basis of sample selection is: (1) considering different vegetation types, i.e. watermelon and corn; (2) considering the visible light pixel, the sample size of 100m square can guarantee at least 4 30 M-pixel is located in the sample; (3) the location of the sample is near the super station, with convenient transportation. The observation of the super station is in the north, and there is a water net node on both sides of the East and the west, which makes it possible to integrate these observations in the future; (4) in addition, there are some obvious points around the sample, which can ensure that the geometric correction of the SAR image is more accurate in the future.            
Considering the resolution of the image, 21 splines (distributed from east to West) are collected at 5m intervals. Each line has 21 points (north-south direction) at 5m intervals. Three hydroprobe data acquisition systems (HDAS, reference 2) are used to measure at the same time. The sampling interval is controlled by the scale and moving splines on the measuring line to make up for the lack of using hand-held GPS.            
Measurement content:            
About 440 points on the quadrat were obtained, and each point was observed twice, i.e. two times in each sampling point, one time inside the film (marked as a in the data record) and one time outside the film (marked as B in the data record); although the watermelon land was also covered with film, considering that it was not laid horizontally, only the soil moisture at the non covered position was measured (marked as B in the two data records). As the HDAS system uses pogo portable soil sensor, the soil temperature, soil moisture (volume moisture content), loss tangent, soil conductivity, real part and imaginary part of soil complex dielectric are observed. Because the vegetation in this area has been sampled and observed once every five days, no special vegetation synchronous sampling has been carried out on that day.            
Data:            
The data format of this data set is vector file, the spatial location is the location of each sampling point (WGS84 + UTM 47N), and the measurement information of soil moisture is recorded in the attribute file.
metadata.descriptionCn:
2012年6月26日在大满加密观测区超级站附近的TerraSAR-X样方进行了卫星过境地面同步观测。TerraSAR-X卫星搭载X波段的合成孔径雷达（SAR），该日过境影像为HH/VV极化，标称分辨率3 m，入射角介于22-24°，过境时间为19:03（北京时间），主要覆盖中游人工绿洲生态水文试验区。本地面同步数据集可为发展和验证主动微波遥感反演土壤水分算法提供基本地面数据集。
样方及采样策略：
选择了超级站东南边的6个自然地块，面积约为100 m×100 m。样方西北角的一个地块为西瓜地，其他为玉米。样方的选择依据是：（1）考虑了不同植被种类，即西瓜和玉米；（2）样方的大小考虑到了可见光像元，100 m见方的大小可以保证至少4个30 m像元落在其中；（3）样方的位置选在超级站附近，交通便利，北面有超级站的观测，东西两侧各有一个WATERNET节点，为今后融入这些观测提供了可能；（4）此外，在样方四周，也有一些明显地物点，能够保证今后对SAR影像的几何纠正比较准确。
考虑到影像的分辨率，同步观测中，以5 m为间隔，采集了21条样线（东西分布），每条线5 m间隔共21个点（南北方向），使用3台Hydraprobe Data Acquisition System （HDAS，参考文献2）同时测量，通过测绳上的刻度和移动样线来控制采样间隔以弥补不能使用手持GPS的不足。
测量内容： 
获取了样方上约440个点，每个点2次观测，即对覆膜玉米地，在每个采样点进行2次观测，1次膜内（数据记录中标记为a），1次膜外（数据记录中标记为b）；西瓜地虽然也覆膜，但考虑到并非水平铺设，只测量非覆膜位置土壤水分（两次数据记录中标记均为b）。由于HDAS系统采用POGO便携式土壤传感器，观测获得土壤温度、土壤水分（体积含水量）、损耗正切、土壤电导率、土壤复介电实部及虚部。因该区域植被开展了例行的5天一次采样观测，因此当日未开展专门的植被同步采样。
数据：
本数据集保存数据格式为矢量文件，空间位置即为各采样点位置（WGS84+UTM 47N），土壤水分等测量信息记录在属性文件中。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What features are considered when selecting a sampling area for soil moisture measurement using remote sensing techniques?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在选择土壤湿度测量的采样区域时，考虑的特征包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: diversity of vegetation types, size of the area, proximity to observation stations, presence of distinct landmarks
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 植被类型的多样性、区域大小、与观测站的距离、显著地标的存在

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many sampling points are included in a dataset related to TerraSAR-X ground synchronous observations?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 与TerraSAR-X地面同步观测相关的数据集中包含多少个采样点？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the purpose of a ground synchronized observation dataset in the context of synthetic aperture radar (SAR) data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在合成孔径雷达（SAR）数据采集的背景下，地面同步观测数据集的目的是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: A ground synchronized observation dataset serves as a foundational ground-truth reference that aids in the development and validation of soil moisture retrieval algorithms using active microwave remote sensing. It involves taking precise, simultaneous ground measurements to match satellite overpass times, ensuring data consistency and accuracy for further analysis.
Definition.AnswerCn: 地面同步观测数据集作为基础的真实参考，有助于利用主动微波遥感技术开发和验证土壤湿度反演算法。该数据集涉及在卫星过境时间匹配的情况下，进行精确的同步地面测量，以确保数据的一致性和准确性，以便进行进一步分析。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the choice of specific sampling strategies and locations in ecological hydrological remote sensing experiments?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在生态水文遥感实验中，选择特定采样策略和地点的因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The choice of sampling strategies and locations in ecological hydrological remote sensing experiments is influenced by various factors, including the diversity of vegetation types, the size and visibility of sample plots relative to the resolution of satellite imagery, proximity to observational stations for logistical convenience, and the presence of identifiable landmarks for accurate geometric correction of SAR imagery. Additionally, considerations for integrating existing observational networks and ensuring robust data for soil moisture algorithm development and validation are also pivotal.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在生态水文遥感实验中，采样策略和地点的选择受到多种因素的影响，包括植被类型的多样性、样本地块的大小和可见性相对于卫星影像的分辨率、与观测站的接近程度以便于后勤便利，以及存在可识别的地标以便于对SAR影像进行准确的几何校正。此外，整合现有观测网络的考虑以及确保为土壤湿度算法开发和验证提供可靠数据也是至关重要的。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of using ground-based synchronized observations with TerraSAR-X satellite data for soil moisture retrieval in artificial oasis eco-hydrological regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用地面同步观测与TerraSAR-X卫星数据结合进行人工绿洲生态水文区域土壤湿度提取的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of ground-based synchronized observations with TerraSAR-X satellite data can lead to the development and validation of soil moisture retrieval algorithms using active microwave remote sensing. By collecting detailed ground truth data, researchers can enhance the accuracy of soil moisture models, particularly in artificial oasis eco-hydrological regions. This approach also facilitates the integration of different observational networks (e.g., WATERNET nodes) and improves the geometric correction accuracy of SAR images, aiding in more precise ecological and hydrological assessments.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用地面同步观测与TerraSAR-X卫星数据相结合，可以开发和验证使用主动微波遥感的土壤湿度反演算法。通过收集详细的地面实测数据，研究人员可以提高土壤湿度模型的准确性，特别是在人工绿洲生态水文区域。这种方法还促进了不同观测网络（例如WATERNET节点）的整合，并提高了SAR图像的几何校正精度，有助于更精确的生态和水文评估。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary goals of conducting satellite overpass ground synchronized observations using TerraSAR-X in ecological and hydrological research?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用TerraSAR-X进行卫星过境地面同步观测在生态和水文研究中的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goals include developing and validating active microwave remote sensing algorithms for soil moisture retrieval, leveraging the high-resolution TerraSAR-X imagery and ground-based measurements to improve the accuracy and utility of remote sensing data in ecological and hydrological studies.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标包括开发和验证用于土壤湿度提取的主动微波遥感算法，利用高分辨率的TerraSAR-X影像和地面测量数据，提高遥感数据在生态和水文研究中的准确性和实用性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedural steps involved in conducting synchronized ground observations with TerraSAR-X satellite imagery for soil moisture retrieval in a designated ecological and hydrological test area?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 进行同步地面观测与TerraSAR-X卫星影像结合以获取指定生态和水文测试区土壤湿度的程序步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedure involves selecting sampling plots based on diverse vegetation types such as watermelon and corn, ensuring plot size aligns with visible light pixel coverage. Plots are chosen near a superstation for accessibility and integration with existing observation networks. Ground observations are synchronized with the TerraSAR-X satellite overpass, using a 5-meter interval to collect 21 east-west sample lines, each with 21 points spaced 5 meters apart north-south. Three Hydraprobe Data Acquisition Systems are used for simultaneous measurements. Soil moisture and temperature are collected using portable soil sensors, with two observations per point for covered corn fields and non-covered points in watermelon fields. Data is stored in vector format with spatial positions and soil moisture information recorded in attribute files.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该程序涉及根据不同的植被类型（如西瓜和玉米）选择采样地块，确保地块大小与可见光像素覆盖相匹配。地块选择靠近超级站，以便于访问并与现有观测网络整合。地面观测与TerraSAR-X卫星过境同步，采用5米间隔收集21条东西向样本线，每条线有21个点，南北方向间隔5米。使用三台Hydraprobe数据采集系统进行同步测量。使用便携式土壤传感器收集土壤湿度和温度数据，在覆盖的玉米田和非覆盖的西瓜田点上每个点进行两次观测。数据以矢量格式存储，空间位置和土壤湿度信息记录在属性文件中。
